lyrics:
Yeah, it's Dru Down baby
Comin' straight from that izno a.k. no play
Matter of fact listen to my baby.

Can you feel me?
I said I'm doin' what I gotta do stayin' true to tha crew
Check it
Can you feel me?
I said I'm deep down and dirty I grew up hella early
Can you feel me?
I said I fantasize about the dreams havin' big fancy things
Can you feel me?
I can still remember when I stole my first diamond ring

OK, I'm deep down and dirty, you heard me before
But I'ma kick this shit like I be kickin' in some front doors
Now popo or five O straight on that real, always been real, fifteen blocks down the
street from that feel. But still see niggas have got it wrong, that
Popo is five O. and that is my hoe. Come and see me some time, bust a
(rim?) and bust a rhyme, after that I fucked that (rimmy?), bust a
Rhyme and get a dime. And lets smoke, choke, until the break of dusk
Fuck that bitch dawn, and put that penny in my palm. Understand this
I roles deep in tha five, I've been down with tha five, I gets dirty
in tha five. And do a hoo ride. Why? That is tha question, devils be
guessin', don't question, stressin'. Livin' in tha ghetto, hello, you
Betta hear me, and if ya don't you betta really try to feel me

Can you feel me?
I said I'm doin' what I gotta do, stayin' true to tha crew, so true
Can you feel me?
I said I'm deep down and dirty, I grew up hella early
Can you feel me?
I said I fantasize about tha dreams, havin' big fancy things
Can you feel me?
I can still remember when I stole my first diamond ring

Mama always told me it'd be days like this. So I took myself to
Traders and bought myself up a pimp and and some clips
Shit was gettin' hectic, check this niggas try to wrecka, bets and etc
And I bet ya ya life has never been a taken like, I'm deep down and
dirty early. But see pearly, at the age of three, took my ass in
Cause my momma was deceased. I still ended up a with tha gangsta
Comin' from tha street, having mentality, causin' casualties, don't
Be mad at me. I'm D.D., pimp playa O.G., born up in tha city of the
O.A.K.L.A.N.D., ghetto brown hustla, no sucka, serious about my
Bussiness. What is this? Now dig this, I overnight became rich. I'm
Me, not tha ordinary nigga from tha street, grew up, threw up, to what
I wanted to be, and what I sing

Can you feel me?
I said I'm doin' what I gotta do, stayin' true to tha crew
Can you feel me?
I said I'm deep down and dirty, I grew up hella early
Can you feel me?
I said I fantasize about tha dreams havin' big fancy things
Can you feel me?
I can still remember when I stole my first diamond ring

It didn't matter my money was gettin' low, I'm on tha struggle
Whatever a nigga go for he gots be on tha double. But solo, cause
Niggas be bitches and snitches at tha same time, but I'm a go and get
My nine. And find these niggas who be talkin' a hell of a lot a to
These bitches, these bitches who be talkin' a hell of a lot a to these
Niggas who be riggers, but I'm a go and hit and do a dig em smack, a to
Your ass back to the future. Smoke super, I'm rollin' in tha six eight
Cougar, while Reugers I masta mind like Lex Luger. It ain't no thing
Like a chicken wing, with the (mob/wild?) of a master
Our mission is never impossible. Not for me, see, so fuck that O. series, you stuck
On that screen I laugh, I'm over mescaline
I see you dream as a triple beam, with hella dope from a muthafucka
With no cut bro

Can you feel me?
I said I'm doin' what I gotta do, stayin' true to tha crew
Can you feel me?
I said I'm deep down and dirty, I grew up hella early
Can you feel me?
I said I fantasize about tha dreams, havin' big fancy things
Can you feel me?
I can still remember when I stole my first diamond ring

Yeah, can you feel me?
D.d, grew up, threw up, to what I wanted to be and what I sing.
Can you feel me?
Can ya, can ya
That's what I want for you to feel me
